version_description:
[New Function]
1.Added Angel inheritance system that the former angel's training and promotion level can be inherited to the new angel without loss;
2.Added lineup drag editing function that player can drag angels blow to the lineup. And this function can be used to inherit quickly;
3.Added Fortune Angel function. Players can set an angel as fortune angel and if you get the angel by summoning you can claim double rewards;
4.Added sapphire store and point store will be deleted. The remaining points will be converted to sapphires in a ratio of 1:0.75;
5.Added a function to close tips in idle time in setting;
[Optimized Contents]
1.Optimize the angel classification: the 5 star angels belong to the SSR level, the 4 star angels are SR+ and SR level, the 3 star angels are R+ and R level, and the 2 star angels are N level;
2.Adjust some angels’ classifications. Now Siren, Nike and idun are 4 star SR angels. Shennong, Sif and Raphael are 3 star R angels;
3.Optimize advanced summon. Odin shards will be added to it. The number of a 5-star angel shards obtained is changed from 5 to 2, but the probability of occurrence is increased from 3% to 7.5% ;
4.Optimize the skill value of some angels;
5.Optimize the combat power calculation formula. The angel combat power value may change but the actual combat effect remains unchanged.

[New Function]
1.Added new angel Hera.
2.Added new function to change language in game. Players can click language button to choose language on personal info interface.
3.Added Thanksgiving event which will be opened next Tuesday (UTC+8).
[Optimized Contents]
1.Optimize the bleeding effect that in addition to prohibiting treatment, it will also prohibit life recovery and Leech.
2.Optimize the EVA effect that skills will also be dodged.
3.Optimize honor arena that now top 100 players in each server can participate in it.
4.Optimize the difficulty of some dungeons in star trial.
5.Optimize equipment smelt system that only orange equipment will appear whose level is the same as the level of the equipment dropped in dungeons.
6.Optimize the attribute bonus value of angel fashion.
7.Optimize the rating calculation of Get Stronger system.
8.Optimize the display of some panels and special effects.
[Bug Fix]
1.Fix the bug of incorrect guild name in friend request system.
2.Fix the bug that players cannot re-challenge passed storeys to refresh record in Sky Tower.
3.Fix the bug that attribute and CR refresh is not timely when upgrading gems.

[New Function]
1. Add New Year event, during Jan 1st to 3rd in 2020. The event includes login award and value package.
[Optimized Contents]
1. Adjust come lags and display views.

[New Function]
1. Add 2 new chapters on the battle;
2. Add a new language chat channel, which will be assigned to the corresponding chat channel according to the game language you selected;
3. Double rewards for receiving prizes in adventures and adventures, with probability trigger when completing 3-5 stars adventures or adventures;
4. The goddess illustrated book has a new function to view the skin;
[Optimized Contents]
1. Optimize network lag problem;
2. Optimized the problem that video cannot pop up in adventure and another gameplay;
3. The gems will support the use of advanced gems for upgrading;
4. Optimize some interface display.

[Optimized Contents]
1. optimized some UI displays
2. Optimized the stability of game client
[Bug Fixes]
1. Fixed the bug where the guild chat get deleted after restarting the game
2. Fixed the bug where the Sky-tower ranking did not refresh in time
3. Fixed the incorrect guild contribution point displayed in guild member list.

［New Function］
1. Newly-added event “ocean gift” will be available from June 4th to June 10th (UTC+8), including login rewards, over-value limited time gift package, item exchange and limited summoning points. So stay tuned!
2. The limited summoning event of Hera and Cupid will be available from June 4th to June 10th.
[Optimized Contents]
1. optimized the text display of some interface
[Bug Fix]
1. Fixed the incorrect CR displayed in the ranking list
2. Fixed the problem that sometimes the surprise limited package couldn’t be purchased.

[Optimized Contents]
1. Optimize some interfaces, text and sound effects;
2. Adjust the training mechanism. After the adjustment, the difficulty of training when the stage is about to be completed is greatly reduced, but it is not so easy to train when you just enter the new stage;
3. Adjust the summon probability of elite summon;
4. The adventure system moves from competition to daily;
5. Optimize the guard angel, when all guardian positions are full, click the one-key guardian to automatically change to a higher angels selection;
6. Decrease the difficulty of the 301-350 level of the sky tower, and optimize the combat strength display of other levels to make it more reasonable, and the actual intensity has not changed;
7. Optimize the calculation formula of the angels' power, the actual attributes will not be changed;
8. Adjust the special effects of Chaos' skills;
9. Players who have registered before version 3.0.0 will refresh the number of monthly limited package purchases after this update;
10. Adjust the Arena open level to 20, and the rank board’s open level to 15;
11. Sapphire store added some commodities;
[Bug Fix]
1. Fix the problem that the additional damage in Chaos' 2 skill is not real damage;
2. Fix the problem that some Main Story and Achieved tasks have reached incorrect conditions;
3. Fix the problem that more than 6 angels can be in line-up. After the update, all players with more than 6 angels in line-up will be reset to 1 (main character);
4. Fix the problem of incorrect calculation of Princess Bari's power, the actual attributes will not change;
5. Fix the problem that the angels’ attribute is too high for players who are not online after version 3.0.0;
6. Fix some other known problems;
【Update Notice】
We will add the Training Vials synthetic function in the next version, so stay tuned.
